name: Dome of Darkness
desc: Breaking the item immediately creates a supernatural dome of darkness covering an area of 80 square feet. This darkness remains motionless for 1 minute in the location where it was generated, after which it dissipates as if it were smoke.

name: Free Spirit
desc: Any attempt to dominate or control the bearer of this item faces strong supernatural opposition.

name: Freedom
desc: This item always points to the place where its owner will find freedom or the means to achieve it. Likewise, it always points to the exit to any place the character is currently inhabiting.

name: Immune to Poison
desc: The bearer is immune to poison.

name: Mental Shield
desc: This item gives a resistance bonus against spells intended to read or control the mind of its owner.

name: Snake Eyes
desc: The bearer can see through the eyes of any snake within 800 feet. A character can use this power even through supernatural barriers.

name: Woodland Path
desc: When moving through a forest while carrying this item, vegetation parts for the bearer, allowing them to move through freely and without leaving a sign.

name: Beacon
desc: The bearer can use a bonus action to cause the item to shed bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet, or to extinguish the light.

name: Compass
desc: The wielder can use an action to learn which way is north.

name: Delver
desc: While underground, the bearer of this item always knows the item’s depth below the surface and the direction to the nearest staircase, ramp, or other path leading upward.

name: Guardian
desc: The item whispers warnings to its bearer, granting a +2 bonus to initiative if the bearer isn’t incapacitated.

name: Language
desc: The bearer can speak and understand a language of the DM’s choice while the item is on the bearer’s person.

name: Temperate
desc: The bearer suffers no harm in temperatures as cold as −20 degrees Fahrenheit or as warm as 120 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Ability
desc: The user of this item has proficiency, advantage, or some other bonus on a particular ability.

name: Altar
desc: The user of this items can make offerings or sacrifices to it or a powerful entity it is associated with. If the item or entity is pleased, the item or user gains a temporary boost.

name: Bloodthirsty
desc: This grants itself or its user a temporary boost when its user kills an enemy or reduces it to 0 hit points.

name: Compass
desc: This item points directly to a known place in the world, regardless of distance, or just straight north.

name: Decoy
desc: When the user of this item takes damage, the item instead takes some or all of the damage. It can only absorb a limited amount of damage before breaking or becoming temporarily unusable.

name: Eye
desc: This item allows its user to see or hear through it. This property may not work if the item is too far away, on a different plane of existence, or protected by abjuration magic or solid lead.

name: Lingual
desc: This item allows its user to read, write, speak, and understand a certain language, usually one associated with its creator.

name: Lesser Spellcasting
desc: This item can be used to cast a particular cantrip or low-level spell when its user wills it.

name: Telepathic
desc: This item grants its user telepathy, either short-range or only under certain conditions.

name: Tracker
desc: This item can track down nearby creatures given a tiny amount of their flesh, blood, or scent, or one of their possessions.

name: Magic Attack
desc: This item has a magical attack unique to itself.

name: Blessing
desc: The user of this item can use it to grants some temporary boon to their allies, such as temporary hit points, additional damage with attacks, bonuses to rolls, or advantage on certain checks or saves.

name: Conditions
desc: This item inflicts a condition upon enemies (blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned, or asleep, diseased, insane, etc).

name: Damaging
desc: This item can be used to deal extra damage of some type to foes, such as fire, cold, lightning, thunder, acid, or poison.

name: Elemental
desc: This item can be used to conjure or manipulate air, earth, fire, water, lightning, heat, cold, acid, or another element.

name: Foe
desc: This item is designed to fight monsters of a certain type. It may warn its user when such enemies are near, be extra effective against them in combat, weaken them when they are nearby, prevent them from approaching its user, or banish them to their plane of origin.

name: Protective
desc: This item grants a boost to its user's AC, saves, or maximum hit points, or grants them temporary hit points, protection against a certain type of attack (such as projectile weapons), advantage on saving throws on spells. It might make its user take half damage when failing certain save-for-half rolls or no damage on a success. It might also have the ability to temporarily grant advanced protection.

name: Stealth
desc: This item is made for stealth or disguise. It might mask its user's appearance, prevent them from making noise, or turn them invisible.

name: Athletic
desc: This item enables its user to climb or swim better, increases their jump distance, allows them to walk on walls, removes penalties from difficult terrain, reduces fall damage, or has some other similar ability.

name: Aquatic
desc: This item grants its user a swim speed, water breathing, or both, or it grants some other underwater-appropriate power.

name: Charged
desc: This item allows its user to deal damage to objects or enemies by expending health, spell slots, or another resource.

name: Flight
desc: This item grants its user the power of flight or levitation.

name: Illusory
desc: This item conjures up specific illusions, which may disguise itself or its user, or be able to move and act independently for a short time.

name: Magic Shield
desc: This item immunizes its user against scrying, mind reading, fear, charm, or some other undesirable magical effect.

name: Resistant
desc: This item grants resistance to a certain type of damage, or immunity to poison or psychic damage.

name: Sensory
desc: This item grants its user specific senses, such as darkvision, blindsight, tremorsense, truesight (if it's especially powerful), a bonus to perception, or the ability to sense magic. It may be an item that must be used, such as a lens that gives the user darksight while looking through it or a torch that reveals invisible creatures and objects touched by its light, or it might simply impart these senses upon its user.

name: Shapeshifting
desc: This item can polymorph its user into a different type of creature.

name: Speedy
desc: This item enables its user to move or take certain actions more quickly. It most likely enables them to do something that normally requires a full action as a bonus action.

name: Animal
desc: This item is made for a non-sentient companion, such as a horse, or it has the power to manipulate certain animals.

name: Animate
desc: This item acts on its own when its user wills it.

name: Attractive/Repulsive
desc: This item can be used to push, pull, grab, or grapple items or creatures.

name: Bulwark
desc: The user of this item has advantage on saving throws made to maintain concentration.

name: Locator
desc: This item knows the direction to the nearest object or location of a certain type, such as food, running water, temples to a specific god, or interplanar portals.

name: Magic Detection
desc: This item can detect nearby magic, and may be able to identify it to some degree.

name: Observer
desc: This item can impart its user with some knowledge of the surrounding area, such as a map, the locations of traps, or the types of creature nearby.

name: Polymorphic
desc: This item can transform into a particular type of creature or other living thing, usually a non-sentient or semi-sentient creature.

name: Random
desc: When used, this item causes a random effect. It has a mix of harmful and helpful effects.

name: Scanner
desc: This item can impart its user with some knowledge of nearby creatures, such as their thoughts, alignment, weaknesses, or if they are shapeshifted.
